title: Amazing Materials
abstractText:
We propose to design an interactive exhibit, themed Amazing Materials, to demonstrate several types of materials with unusual properties and behaviour, including superconductors, negative thermal expansion materials, auxetic materials, liquid crystals, thermochromic materials, ferrofluids and fuel cell materials. The activity will involve poster displays, hands-on exhibits and demonstrations and discussions with active young researchers.

The project will take place at Durham Science Festival held at Durham University Science Site in the week of  26 March 2007. The target audience are Year 9 and Year 10 science students from secondary schools in the North East. The expected attandance is about 500 pupils.
impactText:
This was a small grant (?1450) under the National Science Week awards scheme, to purchase items for the Amazing Materials demo/display for the Durham Science Festival.
